transcript:
when you feel good taking action is much
easier than when you feel bad when you
feel bad taking action is really really
hard and so what do we try to do we're
trying to train your brain into getting
to a state of calm and peace and realize
that everything is safe there's nothing
wrong in this present moment so
therefore in that moment we feel good so
that we can take action towards what it
is we need to do
